flawed_nl_solution:
After buying 3 pieces of gum Ariana has 10 + 3 = <<10+3=13>>13 pieces of gum.
After giving her 11 friends gum Ariana has 13 - 11 = <<13-11=5>>5 pieces of gum left.
#### 5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
